Description:
who you areYou are an experienced Consultant with main focus on the health of children.Skills & Competencies:·   Excellent communications skills;·    
Active listener, patient and calm;·    
Outstanding diagnostic and problem solving abilities;·    
In depth knowledge of children epidemiology and infectious diseases;·    Exquisite knowledge of diagnostic, treatment and rehabilitation principles and techniques;·    
Up to date knowledge of drugs/medication appropriate for children and their side-effects;Education & Qualifications:·  MBBS or equivalent qualification AND completion of high qualification (Specialty Diploma, Fellowship, PHD, European Board, American, Canadian, German, Irish & UK Board)·    
Experience not less than 12 years in total, 7 years after the high qualification will get Consultant level license.·    
Experience not less than 7 years in total, 5 years after the high qualification will get Specialist level license.Job Details
